# Research Data Management {.center-align background-color="#0F4C81"}

## Three terms for three stages {.smaller}

| term                                      | explanation                                                                               | file format                     |
|----------------|------------------|------------------------|
| unprocessed [raw]{.highlight-red} data | data that is not processed and [remains in its original form and file type]{.highlight-red} | often XLSX, also CSV and others |

: {.striped tbl-colwidths="\[20, 60, 20\]"}

## Three stages of data {.smaller}

| term                                               | explanation                                                                                                          | file format                     |
|----------------|------------------|------------------------|
| unprocessed [raw]{.highlight-red} data          | data that is not processed and [remains in its original form and file]{.highlight-red}                            | often XLSX, also CSV and others |
| [processed]{.highlight-red} analysis-ready data | data that is processed to [prepare for an analysis]{.highlight-red} and is exported in its new form as a new file | CSV                             |

: {.striped tbl-colwidths="\[20, 60, 20\]"}

## Three stages of data {.smaller}

| term                                                     | explanation                                                                                                                                                                                     | file format                     |
|----------------|------------------|------------------------|
| unprocessed [raw]{.highlight-red} data                | data that is not processed and [remains in its original form and file]{.highlight-red}                                                                                                       | often XLSX, also CSV and others |
| [processed]{.highlight-red} analysis-ready data       | data that is processed to [prepare for an analysis]{.highlight-red} and is exported in its new form as a new file                                                                            | CSV, R data packages            |
| [final]{.highlight-red} data underlying a publication | data that is the [result of an analysis]{.highlight-red} (e.g descriptive statistics or data visualization) and shown in a publication, but then also exported in its new form as a new file | CSV                             |

: {.striped tbl-colwidths="\[20, 60, 20\]"}
